price: Woi kyerε sε ampa, Nyankopͻn ne Nokorε no, na wͻn a wͻfri N’akyi sufrε wͻn no deε εyε atorͻsεm. Nokorε sε Nyankopͻn ne Okokroko no, Ɔne Ɔkεseε no.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-anna mā yadʿūna min dūnihi al-bāṭilu wa-anna al-laha huwa al-ʿaliyu al-kabīru
